Pages.Title: Home Page
Pages.Description: Website home page for this layout. It contains a hero banner, cards grid and other sections

Pages.Title: Side navigation layout
Pages.Description: In this layout the left side navigation is occupying 1/4 of the page. The rest of the content resides on the right side

Pages.Title: Landing page layout
Pages.Description: Landing page layout goes full width and doen't have a predefined width container. Instead, there are multiple content container sections.

Pages.Title: One column page layout
Pages.Description: In the one column layout the main content is enclosed into the narrower content container.
